sqlMap.select: select t1.*, sum(t1.amount) as total, t2.name as productName, t2.code as productCode , t3.name as depotpartName , t3.type as depotpartType from T_CENTER_STORAGERALATION t1, t_center_product t2, t_center_depotpart t3 where t1.locationid = #depotId# and t1.productid = t2.id and t1.depotpartId = t3.id GROUP by t1.productid, t1.depotpartId
